page.title: 13LIFE AND WORK OF A HOLT FARM
page.content: {THE FARMS HISTORY The farm is called 'Holt Vale Farm' Mrs Nuttand owns a house on her farm which is 280 years old. Other parts of the farm are even older, like the barn. Originally it was a dairy farm but it hasn't been used for those purposes for a year. {MRS NUTTANDS THOUGHTS ON HOLT Holt does't have many shops so she shops mostly in Wimborne. She seems to have plenty of social amusements. Mrs Nuttand chose to live Holt after living Australia because of the peace and tranquility of Holt. She has lived in Holt for fifteen years. {FARMING TODAY Poultry are kept for eggs; also on the farm are a dog and two cats. Her husband is semi-retired and helps on farms in the area.
